title: 2 B18 Joe Jackson Blankets (Both Green and Purple Variations) For Sale
author: canjond

posts.post_title: 2 B18 Joe Jackson Blankets (Both Green and Purple Variations) For Sale
posts.post_content:
I have a very nice Joe Jackson B18 blanket for sale.  Condition is very very strong with one small spot.  Borders are oversized, there is no fraying, and the blanket was never sewn. 

This is one of the most reasonable "period" Joe Jax pieces you can purchase.

$750.00 shipped OBO.

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/JJax.jpg[/IMG]

Rarer green and white version.  Nice oversized borders.  Some light staining on the front.  Never sewn and no fraying.  $600 shipped OBO.

[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/IMAG0046.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i82.photobucket.com/albums/j263/jon_canfield/IMAG0047.jpg[/IMG]
Bump for addition of second Jax blanket.
